title: En Nenju chinna ilai lyrics Uthama puthiran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Prakash, Saindhavi
Lyrics: Priyan
Music : Vijay Antony

Hey you are my love . You are my destiny

En nenju chinna ilai,Neethan en kadhal mazhai
unnale nan nenaya vendum.
En nenju chinna kodi, neethan en kadhal chedi
nan unnai suttrikolla vendum.

Parvaigal pudhu varthai parimaruthe
idhayangal idamaruthe.
Unnale en nimidangal azhaganadhe
vazhi kooda sugamanadhe.

En nenju chinna ilai,Neethan en kadhal mazhai
unnale nan nenaya vendum.
En nenju chinna kodi, neethan en kadhal chedi
nan unnai suttrikolla vendum.

Unnodu pesikolla varthaigal serthuvaithu
Ullukkul thiki thavithene
Un perai mattum dhinam nenjukul solli solli
en perai indru marandhene
Manjal nilave, konjal mozhiye,
vetkathimire saikkathe
Aasai kanave, meesai puyale,
Nitham isayin nee kollathe

En nenju chinna ilai ....
En nenju chinna kodi ...

Un moochu kaatru pattu pookindra pookellam
Un pole vasanaigal veesum
Unnodu nanirukum nerangal athanaiyum
Podhadhu endru manam aengum
Minnal vizhiye, kannak kuliye,
Kutti kavidhai neethane
Muthathadame chutti thaname
Motha sugamum ne enbene..

En nenju chinna ilai,Neethan en kadhal mazhai
unnale nan nenaya vendum.
En nenju chinna kodi, neethan en kadhal chedi
nan unnai suttrikolla vendum.

Parvaigal pudhu varthai parimaruthe
idhayangal idamaruthe.
Unnale en nimidangal azhaganadhe
vazhi kooda sugamanadhe.

En nenju chinna ilai ...
En nenju chinna kodi....
